title: Which subject do you find the easiest in your school? - Quora

response.answer_text: One of the subjects I find the easiest in my school would be GIS, stands for Geographic Information System. It’s easy because most of the time I work by using the instructions provided in the booklet. If I follow the instructions based on its given, then my map will turns out how I wanted it to be.

For me it was Physics and French ( cuz we speak French at home ). They were my two favorite subjects in high school. I compare school subjects to food…too much and you lose the taste or get bored with it…as you grow older you find new interesting subjects ( like when you get in college/university you might change your mind to something else ). NOTE: I’m still engaged to Physics…it’s all about the physical world we are living in.
